blocks.name: cslmd
blocks.content: Extend class notation with class of all semimodules.
blocks.origin: const class cslmd { SLMod }

blocks.name: diff.cslmd.s
diff.cslmd.c
diff.cslmd.w
df-slmd
blocks.content: Define the class of all (left) modules over semirings, i.e. semimodules, which are generalizations of left modules. A semimodule is a commutative monoid (=vectors) together with a semiring (=scalars) and a left scalar product connecting them. ` ( 0 [,] +oo ) ` for example is not a full fledged left module, but is a semimodule. Definition of [Golan] p. 149. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 21-Mar-2018.)

  anabsan2(wa(wcel(c0, cslmd), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))), wcel(c4, c5), wceq(co(co(c1, c6, c3), c7, c4), co(co(c1, c7, c4), c8, co(c3, c7, c4))))

  simpld(w3a(wcel(c0, cslmd), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c4, c5))), w3a(wcel(co(c3, c7, c4), c5), wceq(co(c3, c7, co(c4, c8, c4)), co(co(c3, c7, c4), c8, co(c3, c7, c4))), wceq(co(co(c1, c6, c3), c7, c4), co(co(c1, c7, c4), c8, co(c3, c7, c4)))), w3a(wceq(co(co(c1, cfv(cmulr, c9), c3), c7, c4), co(c1, c7, co(c3, c7, c4))), wceq(co(cfv(cur, c9), c7, c4), c4), wceq(co(cfv(c0g, c9), c7, c4), cfv(c0g, c0))))
  slmdlema(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c4, c7, c8, c6, cfv(cmulr, c9), cfv(cur, c9), cfv(c0g, c9), cfv(c0g, c0), c9)
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c0))

thm slmdvsass(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cslmd), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c5))), wceq(co(co(c1, c6, c3), c7, c4), co(c1, c7, co(c3, c7, c4))))

  3imp2(wcel(c0, cslmd), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c5), wceq(co(co(c1, c6, c3), c7, c4), co(c1, c7, co(c3, c7, c4))))
  exp42(wcel(c0, cslmd), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c5), wceq(co(co(c1, c6, c3), c7, c4), co(c1, c7, co(c3, c7, c4))))
  anabsan2(wa(wcel(c0, cslmd), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))), wcel(c4, c5), wceq(co(co(c1, c6, c3), c7, c4), co(c1, c7, co(c3, c7, c4))))
  3expa(wcel(c0, cslmd), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c4, c5)), wceq(co(co(c1, c6, c3), c7, c4), co(c1, c7, co(c3, c7, c4))))
  simp1d(w3a(wcel(c0, cslmd), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c4, c5))), wceq(co(co(c1, c6, c3), c7, c4), co(c1, c7, co(c3, c7, c4))), wceq(co(cfv(cur, c8), c7, c4), c4), wceq(co(cfv(c0g, c8), c7, c4), cfv(c0g, c0)))
  simprd(w3a(wcel(c0, cslmd), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c4, c5))), w3a(wceq(co(co(c1, c6, c3), c7, c4), co(c1, c7, co(c3, c7, c4))), wceq(co(cfv(cur, c8), c7, c4), c4), wceq(co(cfv(c0g, c8), c7, c4), cfv(c0g, c0))), w3a(wcel(co(c3, c7, c4), c5), wceq(co(c3, c7, co(c4, cfv(cplusg, c0), c4)), co(co(c3, c7, c4), cfv(cplusg, c0), co(c3, c7, c4))), wceq(co(co(c1, cfv(cplusg, c8), c3), c7, c4), co(co(c1, c7, c4), cfv(cplusg, c0), co(c3, c7, c4)))))
  slmdlema(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c4, c7, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cplusg, c8), c6, cfv(cur, c8), cfv(c0g, c8), cfv(c0g, c0), c8)
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c8))
  eqid(cfv(cur, c8))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c8))
}

blocks.name: slmdvs1
blocks.content: Scalar product with ring unit. ( ~ ax-hvmulid analog.) (Contributed by NM, 10-Jan-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jun-2014.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Apr-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm slmdvs1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cslmd), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(c3, c4, c1), c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(csca, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cvsca, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cur, c5))
} = {
  syl122anc(wa(wcel(c0, cslmd), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(c3, c4, c1), c1), wcel(c0, cslmd), wcel(c3, cfv(cbs, c5)), wcel(c3, cfv(cbs, c5)), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c1, c2))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cslmd), wcel(c1, c2))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cslmd), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cfv(cbs, c5)))
  slmd1cl(c0, c3, cfv(cbs, c5), c5)
  simpr(wcel(c0, cslmd), wcel(c1, c2))
  simp2d(w3a(wcel(c0, cslmd), wa(wcel(c3, cfv(cbs, c5)), wcel(c3, cfv(cbs, c5))), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c1, c2))), wceq(co(c3, c4, c1), c1), wceq(co(co(c3, cfv(cmulr, c5), c3), c4, c1), co(c3, c4, co(c3, c4, c1))), wceq(co(cfv(c0g, c5), c4, c1), cfv(c0g, c0)))
  simprd(w3a(wcel(c0, cslmd), wa(wcel(c3, cfv(cbs, c5)), wcel(c3, cfv(cbs, c5))), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c1, c2))), w3a(wceq(co(co(c3, cfv(cmulr, c5), c3), c4, c1), co(c3, c4, co(c3, c4, c1))), wceq(co(c3, c4, c1), c1), wceq(co(cfv(c0g, c5), c4, c1), cfv(c0g, c0))), w3a(wcel(co(c3, c4, c1), c2), wceq(co(c3, c4, co(c1, cfv(cplusg, c0), c1)), co(co(c3, c4, c1), cfv(cplusg, c0), co(c3, c4, c1))), wceq(co(co(c3, cfv(cplusg, c5), c3), c4, c1), co(co(c3, c4, c1), cfv(cplusg, c0), co(c3, c4, c1)))))
  slmdlema(c0, c3, cfv(cbs, c5), c3, c1, c2, c1, c4, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cplusg, c5), cfv(cmulr, c5), c3, cfv(c0g, c5), cfv(c0g, c0), c5)
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c5))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c5))
  eqid(cfv(cmulr, c5))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c5))
}

blocks.name: slmd0vs
blocks.content: Zero times a vector is the zero vector. Equation 1a of [Kreyszig] p. 51. ( ~ ax-hvmul0 analog.) (Contributed by NM, 12-Jan-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jun-2014.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Apr-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm slmd0vs(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cslmd), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(c3, c4, c1), c5))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(csca, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cvsca, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c6))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(c0g, c0))
} = {
  simp3d(wa(wcel(c0, cslmd), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(c3, c4, c1), c5), wceq(co(co(c3, cfv(cmulr, c6), c3), c4, c1), co(c3, c4, co(c3, c4, c1))), wceq(co(cfv(cur, c6), c4, c1), c1))
  simprd(wa(wcel(c0, cslmd), wcel(c1, c2)), w3a(wceq(co(co(c3, cfv(cmulr, c6), c3), c4, c1), co(c3, c4, co(c3, c4, c1))), wceq(co(cfv(cur, c6), c4, c1), c1), wceq(co(c3, c4, c1), c5)), w3a(wcel(co(c3, c4, c1), c2), wceq(co(c3, c4, co(c1, cfv(cplusg, c0), c1)), co(co(c3, c4, c1), cfv(cplusg, c0), co(c3, c4, c1))), wceq(co(co(c3, cfv(cplusg, c6), c3), c4, c1), co(co(c3, c4, c1), cfv(cplusg, c0), co(c3, c4, c1)))))
  syl122anc(wa(wcel(c0, cslmd), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(w3a(wcel(co(c3, c4, c1), c2), wceq(co(c3, c4, co(c1, cfv(cplusg, c0), c1)), co(co(c3, c4, c1), cfv(cplusg, c0), co(c3, c4, c1))), wceq(co(co(c3, cfv(cplusg, c6), c3), c4, c1), co(co(c3, c4, c1), cfv(cplusg, c0), co(c3, c4, c1)))), w3a(wceq(co(co(c3, cfv(cmulr, c6), c3), c4, c1), co(c3, c4, co(c3, c4, c1))), wceq(co(cfv(cur, c6), c4, c1), c1), wceq(co(c3, c4, c1), c5))), wcel(c0, cslmd), wcel(c3, cfv(cbs, c6)), wcel(c3, cfv(cbs, c6)), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c1, c2))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cslmd), wcel(c1, c2))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cslmd), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cfv(cbs, c6)))
  slmd0cl(c0, c3, cfv(cbs, c6), c6)
  simpr(wcel(c0, cslmd), wcel(c1, c2))
  slmdlema(c0, c3, cfv(cbs, c6), c3, c1, c2, c1, c4, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cplusg, c6), cfv(cmulr, c6), cfv(cur, c6), c3, c5, c6)
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c6))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c6))
  eqid(cfv(cmulr, c6))
  eqid(cfv(cur, c6))
}

blocks.name: slmdvs0
blocks.content: Anything times the zero vector is the zero vector. Equation 1b of [Kreyszig] p. 51. ( ~ hvmul0 analog.) (Contributed by NM, 12-Jan-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jun-2014.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Apr-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm slmdvs0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cslmd), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(c1, c3, c4), c4))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(csca, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cvsca, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(c0g, c0))
} = {
  3eqtr3d(co(c1, c3, c4), c4, co(co(c1, cfv(cmulr, c5), cfv(c0g, c5)), c3, c4), co(cfv(c0g, c5), c3, c4), wa(wcel(c0, cslmd), wcel(c1, c2)))
  oveq1d(co(c1, cfv(cmulr, c5), cfv(c0g, c5)), c3, c4, cfv(c0g, c5), wa(wcel(c0, cslmd), wcel(c1, c2)))
  sylan(wcel(c0, cslmd), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(co(c1, cfv(cmulr, c5), cfv(c0g, c5)), cfv(c0g, c5)), wcel(c5, csrg))
  srgrz(c5, c1, c2, cfv(cmulr, c5), cfv(c0g, c5))
  eqtrd(co(co(c1, cfv(cmulr, c5), cfv(c0g, c5)), c3, c4), co(c1, c3, c4), co(c1, c3, co(cfv(c0g, c5), c3, c4)), wa(wcel(c0, cslmd), wcel(c1, c2)))
  syl13anc(wa(wcel(c0, cslmd), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(co(c1, cfv(cmulr, c5), cfv(c0g, c5)), c3, c4), co(c1, c3, co(cfv(c0g, c5), c3, c4))), wcel(c0, cslmd), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c0g, c5), c2), wcel(c4, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cslmd), wcel(c1, c2))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cslmd), wcel(c1, c2))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cslmd), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c0g, c5), c2), wcel(c5, csrg))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cslmd), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c5, csrg))
  slmdsrg(c0, c5)
  srg0cl(c5, cfv(c0g, c5), c2)
  slmdvsass(c0, c1, c2, cfv(c0g, c5), c4, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cmulr, c5), c3, c5)
  eqid(cfv(cmulr, c5))
  oveq2d(c1, c3, co(cfv(c0g, c5), c3, c4), c4, wa(wcel(c0, cslmd), wcel(c1, c2)))
  syldan(wcel(c0, cslmd), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(co(cfv(c0g, c5), c3, c4), c4), wcel(c4, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cslmd), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c4, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  slmd0vcl(c0, c4, cfv(cbs, c0))
  slmd0vs(c0, c4, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(c0g, c5), c3, c4, c5)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c5))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm slmdvs0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ SLMod ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→(c1[c3]c4)= c4)
  ⊣ c5 =(Scalar ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(× ` c0)
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c5)
  ⊣ c4 =(0 ` c0)
} = {
  3eqtr3d((c1[c3]c4), c4, ((c1[(× ` c5)](0 ` c5))[c3]c4), ((0 ` c5)[c3]c4), (c0 ∈ SLMod ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  oveq1d((c1[(× ` c5)](0 ` c5)), c3, c4, (0 ` c5), (c0 ∈ SLMod ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  sylan(c0 ∈ SLMod, c1 ∈ c2, (c1[(× ` c5)](0 ` c5))=(0 ` c5), c5 ∈ SRing)
  srgrz(c5, c1, c2, (× ` c5), (0 ` c5))
  eqtrd(((c1[(× ` c5)](0 ` c5))[c3]c4), (c1[c3]c4), (c1[c3]((0 ` c5)[c3]c4)), (c0 ∈ SLMod ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  syl13anc((c0 ∈ SLMod ∧ c1 ∈ c2), ((c1[(× ` c5)](0 ` c5))[c3]c4)=(c1[c3]((0 ` c5)[c3]c4)), c0 ∈ SLMod, c1 ∈ c2, (0 ` c5)∈ c2, c4 ∈(Base ` c0))
  simpl(c0 ∈ SLMod, c1 ∈ c2)
  simpr(c0 ∈ SLMod, c1 ∈ c2)
  syl((c0 ∈ SLMod ∧ c1 ∈ c2), (0 ` c5)∈ c2, c5 ∈ SRing)
  adantr(c0 ∈ SLMod, c1 ∈ c2, c5 ∈ SRing)
  slmdsrg(c0, c5)
  srg0cl(c5, (0 ` c5), c2)
  slmdvsass(c0, c1, c2, (0 ` c5), c4, (Base ` c0), (× ` c5), c3, c5)
  eqid((× ` c5))
  oveq2d(c1, c3, ((0 ` c5)[c3]c4), c4, (c0 ∈ SLMod ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  syldan(c0 ∈ SLMod, c1 ∈ c2, ((0 ` c5)[c3]c4)= c4, c4 ∈(Base ` c0))
  adantr(c0 ∈ SLMod, c1 ∈ c2, c4 ∈(Base ` c0))
  slmd0vcl(c0, c4, (Base ` c0))
  slmd0vs(c0, c4, (Base ` c0), (0 ` c5), c3, c4, c5)
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  eqid((0 ` c5))
}
